Helping Humans and Robots Work Together

I am a robotics engineer working to create assistive and home automation technologies. My skill set includes a variety of robotics concepts, up to date knowledge of the state of the art in computer vision, and advanced simulation using cutting edge game engines such as Unity 3D and Unreal Engine.

I have a strong record of personal, academic, and competitive projects involving Computer Vision, 3D Reconstruction, Navigation, Object Detection/Segmentation, Robotic Calibration, Human Robot Interaction, Simulation, and Computer Graphics. I need to highlight a smaller subset of projects that will imply that I know these skills, and then explicitly state them in my resume later on.

I love to share new ideas and collaborate with others to create exciting new products and technologies. If you're interested in discussing new some new ideas, startups or creating a new strategic partnership, please feel free to reach out.
